Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Case.Account}:
There are two payment options available on our website:
Manual Online Payments - You must log in and initiate each payment you make
Direct Debit - We automatically pull the balance due each month.
Each option requires that you apply for that specific option online:
Manual Online Payment:
Go to INVOICE & PAYMENT > MAKE PAYMENT > Enter Bank Information > Add Bank Account.
Enter your banking information and click SUBMIT at the bottom of the screen.
You can find a link to the PAD form near the bottom of the page where you’ll see the phrase ‘PAD Agreement is available to download as a PDF’
Direct Debit:
Go to INVOICE & PAYMENT > DIRECT DEBIT ENROLLMENT and click ADD BANK ACCOUNT.
Enter your banking information and click SUBMIT on the bottom of the screen.
You can find a link to the PAD form near the bottom of the page where you’ll see the phrase ‘PAD Agreement is available to download as a PDF’
You will need to Email or Fax the PAD Agreement and Voided Check to: iol_pad@wexinc.com
Within two business days, the PAD form will be approved, and you will receive a confirmation email and the bank account status will change from PENDING to ACTIVE.
Let us know if you have any questions.
Receivables and Credit Management
{!Case.Collections_Phone_Number__c}
